testcase.classname: user should be able to create new account
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: And user navigate to registration page......................................passed When user select his gender................................................passed And user type the first name and last name..................................passed And user select date of birthday............................................passed And user enter the emil.....................................................passed And user enter the company name.............................................passed And user select newsletter options..........................................passed And user enter password and confirm password................................passed And user click on register button..........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: And user navigate to login page.............................................passed When user enter "shadyy@gmail.com" and "newproject".........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed
